::Iron Raptor/Prowl::

Iron Raptor's expression doesn't change at Megaton's offer. Finding 
out about the two mutants would probably be a good idea, but would it 
be worth helping this Predacon? Probably not, but it would depend on 
what he wants.

-Then ask him,- Prowl's thoughts sound in her head. She growls 
mentally (in her mind).

-I can think for myself, Prowl,- she replies, feeling an apologetic 
thought from Prowl in return.

"What exactly do you mean by 'our cooperation'?" Iron Raptor asks 
Megaton. She was leaning toward telling this bot to get out of her 
face. While she talks, her comm replies to Quatro's message.

The message to Quatro, inaudible externally other than by comm, 
read: "Hmm. If you wait for a while I'll be right with you. I'm 
taking care of something important right now."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> continuing last post
> 
> Megaton wasn't surprised at the results of this meeting, he knew it 
would
> take alot more than a few words and some "good intentions" to win 
them over.
> He couldn't go back to the Black fortress like this, he couldn't 
take no for
> an answer. "Perhaps I could convince you another way." he saw that 
he'd have
> to raise his bid to convince them. "I'll give you copies of any 
information
> at my disposal in return for your cooperation" the offer was on the 
table,
> the die was cast. "Even a little history on these two." He pointed 
at the
> two bots from Veratis. Thier silence had just become his weapon.
> 
> Lunarpine wanted to lash out and silence the beast in freaks skin 
but he
> knew that would raise to much suspicion. he lowered himself to 
Ice's side
> thinking to her, "Well what do we do now?"
